title: Dat Sinkin Feelin’
content:
[http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/sinkin-sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424043844/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/sinkin-sans) and [http://www.k-type.com/fonts/sinkin-sans/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424043844/http:/www.k-type.com/fonts/sinkin-sans/) – Sinkin Sans from Keith Bates of [K-Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424043844/http:/www.k-type.com/).

Slight chance @hrant might like this, as it is Apache-licensed.
author: Té Rowan

comments.content:
Promising! Thanks. I'll take a closer look.
